title: Action Research Workshop for Enhancing Workplace Adaptability for Science Graduates

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and at least three years of professional experience
context.additional_context: Focused on strengthening practical competencies for elementary science education practitioners to adapt to workplace environmental changes

learning_goals: Learners can derive solutions using a 5-step action research process when unexpected workplace problems occur
Learners achieve over 80% adaptability to workplace changes by applying stress management and flexible thinking strategies
Learners successfully execute effective communication techniques at least four times in collaboration simulations with peers and supervisors
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
